entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:46 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
